/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX15.2.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/OpenGL_Project.dir/main.cpp.o -o OpenGL_Project  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib -framework OpenGL /opt/homebrew/lib/libglfw.3.4.dylib /opt/homebrew/lib/libGLEW.dylib
